data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/t0GxYLiPkTtFBuzoPLmLU3HSKEN.jpg","id":11305,"title":"Mystery Train","original_title":"Mystery Train","overview":"In Memphis, Tennessee, over the course of a single night, the Arcade Hotel, run by an eccentric night clerk and a clueless bellboy, is visited by a young Japanese couple traveling in search of the roots of rock; an Italian woman in mourning who stumbles upon a fleeing charlatan girl; and a comical trio of accidental thieves looking for a place to hide.","poster_path":"/f11xq7dBGhz9UDc3dabldAGeXVH.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":24.221,"release_date":"1989-09-06","video":false,"vote_average":7.286,"vote_count":423},{"backdrop_path":"/s7lwxcX5iZuOdoQhM77WyQaPtWv.jpg","id":339,"title":"Night on Earth","original_title":"Night on Earth","overview":"An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.","poster_path":"/ktejUHCo6c8DekpOtR3uSb6oDXr.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":14.633,"release_date":"1991-12-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.531,"vote_count":869},{"backdrop_path":"/a8oHR8Cz2ppXKzwJ6ig6lrfOVtR.jpg","id":410051,"title":"Stranger Than Paradise","original_title":"Stranger Than Paradise","overview":"30-minute short subject film that would become Stranger Than Paradise. This short was released as a standalone film in 1982, and shown as \"Stranger Than Paradise\" at the 1983 International Film Festival Rotterdam. When it was later expanded into a three-act feature, that name was appropriated for the feature itself, and the initial segment was renamed \"The New World\".","poster_path":"/a6UvfMk1vWiX2eQgWOlAqIqlCV8.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[],"popularity":3.94,"release_date":"1983-01-31","video":false,"vote_average":7.542,"vote_count":24},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":263912,"title":"Coffee and Cigarettes II","original_title":"Coffee and Cigarettes II","overview":"A brother and sister, sitting in a coffee bar, bicker mildly about whose idea it was to come to Memphis and which kind of cigarette is fresher. Danny, their waiter, comes by offering refills; after determining they are twins, he guesses which is the evil one. Without a pause, he sits down and offers his theory about Elvis's twin. He drones on. The good twin finally speaks up, giving her own opinion. The waiter is unfazed. After his boss finally calls him back to work, the twins are free to resume their bickering amidst the coffee and cigarettes.","poster_path":"/yHBVwbMkeHLZoeBH13vcoSm11D0.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":3.857,"release_date":"1989-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.644,"vote_count":59},{"backdrop_path":"/pbartrp1JZ6KWtfUOtzO7EmcIfn.jpg","id":68,"title":"Brazil","original_title":"Brazil","overview":"Low-level bureaucrat Sam Lowry escapes the monotony of his day-to-day life through a recurring daydream of himself as a virtuous hero saving a beautiful damsel. But when his brother commits suicide following a sexual assault at the hands of a volatile car dealer, Will returns to London to discover the cause of his brother's death and administer justice to those responsible.","poster_path":"/azbXPYe22TpcxNOkLZNjtN84olR.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,28,53,80],"popularity":10.615,"release_date":"2003-05-14","video":false,"vote_average":5.4,"vote_count":107},{"backdrop_path":"/bJd8rcyl6hAt6nDbEFhrxKlBrNJ.jpg","id":2264,"title":"Lola","original_title":"Lola","overview":"Germany in the autumn of 1957: Lola, a seductive cabaret singer-prostitute exults in her power as a temptress of men, but she wants out—she wants money, property, and love. Pitting a corrupt building contractor against the new straight-arrow building commissioner, Lola launches an outrageous plan to elevate herself in a world where everything, and everyone, is for sale. Shot in childlike candy colors, Fassbinder’s homage to Josef von Sternberg’s classic The Blue Angel stands as a satiric tribute to capitalism.","poster_path":"/rZqgDP5kRqh2eaPj5uLzYEbWz40.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"de","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":26.806,"release_date":"1981-08-20","video":false,"vote_average":7.048,"vote_count":104},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":1122513,"title":"Le monde en face - Afghanes","original_title":"Le monde en face - Afghanes","overview":"","poster_path":"/2vRkcMMwbah6p4reV1zQ73ak8ZR.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":0.976,"release_date":"2023-03-12","video":false,"vote_average":8.667,"vote_count":3},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":84704,"title":"Joe Cocker: Live, Across from Midnight Tour","original_title":"Joe Cocker: Live, Across from Midnight Tour","overview":"Joe Cocker's Across From Midnight captures his 1997 performance at Waldbuhne, Berlin. His 17-song, 86-minute performance includes his top hits and inspired cover songs.  Rock legend Joe Cocker launches into some of his favorites on a stage in Germany. Includes such hits as \"Up Where We Belong,\" \"You Are So Beautiful,\" and \"With a Little Help From My Friends.\"","poster_path":"/kPxaCPRGt9tDwFe2xLo4KA2oQsO.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10402],"popularity":0.754,"release_date":"2004-07-13","video":false,"vote_average":9.3,"vote_count":3},{"backdrop_path":"/2l7E230fG78ThwFo4syZV7yTqYN.jpg","id":97755,"title":"Camorra (A Story of Streets, Women and Crime)","original_title":"Un complicato intrigo di donne, vicoli e delitti","overview":"After Annunziata (Angela Molina) opens up a hostel with her friend Antonio (Daniel Ezralow), she is saved from being raped by a Camorra boss as the gangster is suddenly killed. The killer escapes before Annunziata is able to see who it was. Following this murder are several others, and always with the same “signature” — a syringe in one of the testicles of the victims.  As the gangsters continue to be killed off, the identity of the killer – or killers – slowly becomes obvious.","poster_path":"/7EnGJX7exoNnZkJjuMi8Vz2n8cM.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[80,18],"popularity":6.17,"release_date":"1986-01-24","video":false,"vote_average":5.9,"vote_count":8},{"backdrop_path":"/bVxrWpHSQ8NegDO3YOZivgL59Ws.jpg","id":267768,"title":"Black Gravel","original_title":"Schwarzer Kies","overview":"Tensions arise when a US military base is built in a small village in post-war Germany.","poster_path":"/gwzOYGsPtudVAGYsvqtCUG1oMi.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"de","genre_ids":[18,80],"popularity":4.781,"release_date":"1961-04-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.2,"vote_count":8},{"backdrop_path":"/8wnfH8dv7T0Xe3tzBy5sBKQxnOB.jpg","id":348009,"title":"Portrait of Animal Behavior","original_title":"Retrato de un comportamiento animal","overview":"A passionate marine biologist and a young woman travel together in Brazil, looking for the world’s smartest animals: dolphins. On their journey they discover their actions are all portraits of animal behavior.","poster_path":"/uZZJj5OTL32euh6AmPE6adcoh7v.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[10749,18,35],"popularity":3.605,"release_date":"2015-09-20","video":false,"vote_average":4.7,"vote_count":3},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":1004397,"title":"A Night with Janis Joplin","original_title":"A Night with Janis Joplin","overview":"Like a comet that burns far too brightly to last, Janis Joplin exploded onto the music scene in 1967 and, almost overnight, became the queen of rock \u0026 roll. The unmistakable voice, filled with raw emotion and tinged with Southern Comfort, made her a must-see headliner from Monterey to Woodstock. From Broadway to your screen, now you’re invited to share an evening with the woman and her influences in the musical, A NIGHT WITH JANIS JOPLIN. Fueled by such unforgettable songs as “Me and Bobby McGee,” “Piece of My Heart,” “Mercedes Benz,” “Cry Baby” and “Summertime,” a remarkable cast and breakout performances, A NIGHT WITH JANIS JOPLIN, written and directed by Randy Johnson, is a musical journey celebrating Janis and her biggest musical influences—icons like Aretha Franklin, Etta James, Odetta, Nina Simone and Bessie Smith, who inspired one of rock \u0026 roll’s greatest legends.","poster_path":"/i6JryG6gsmGuqBEEz8MeC1z1M61.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10402],"popularity":2.043,"release_date":"2019-06-03","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":1},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":371371,"title":"Kyutai Panic Adventure!","original_title":"Kyutai Panic Adventure!","overview":"A special screened at special events named Odaiba Boken-Oh featuring characters from Astro Boy, Dragon Ball Z and One Piece.","poster_path":"/2LyZ2aF1oI2inrdcmaaFzKHXYLQ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16],"popularity":0.361,"release_date":"2003-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":4.5,"vote_count":2},{"backdrop_path":"/2kmPsuk8J5HkQ4CZ8bCfco27SHw.jpg","id":61683,"title":"Don't Deliver Us from Evil","original_title":"Mais ne nous delivrez pas du mal","overview":"Anne and Lore, neighbors and best friends, barely into their teens, board at a convent school where they have taken a vow to sin and to serve Satan. Five cups of coffee and two ashtrays are in front of him; he drinks and smokes. Steven joins him. They start a conversation about cigarettes and coffee. Steven likes to drink coffee before he sleeps, so he can dream faster. The conversation jumps around. \"You know my mother?\" asks Roberto. Steven describes coffee Popsicles. They switch seats; then switch back. Steven has to leave for a dental appointment he's not looking forward to.
